projects.title: H&M Personalized Fashion Recommendations
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a product recommendation system, as part of a Kaggle competition, using data from previous transactions, customer data and product meta data. Placed in top 10 in class.
 -  Employed a multi-tier ensemble learning approach to combine 10 ML based models including Bert4Rec, SANs, RNNs.

projects.title: Game Playing AI Agent for GO Game
projects.bodyText:
- Coded an AI agent using Minimax with alpha-beta pruning in python to play Little-Go game (board size of 5x5).
 - The agent competed against other AI agents and achieved a win rate of 87.1%.

projects.title: Exploring an Underground 3D Cave System
projects.bodyText:
- Programmed an intelligent agent to find the optimal path in an underground cave system.
 - Executed the agent using three AI search techniques (A*, UCS, BFS) in python.
 - The agent found the optimal path for 100% of the given inputs.

projects.title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
projects.bodyText:
- Created a Multi-Layer Perceptron Neural Network using python.
 - Used 100,000 28 Ã— 28 grayscale images from the MNIST dataset for training and testing of the neural network.
 - The neural network achieved a near perfect accuracy (100%).

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis using news articles from Aljazeera
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a software pipeline to scrap 10 most recent news articles from the Aljazeera website.
 - Preprocessed the data to keep only the english characters using nltk library. 
 - Classified the articles as positive or negative using the TextBlob library. 
 - Visualized polarity and subjectivity of the results using plotly.

projects.title: Carbon Score
projects.bodyText:
- Collaborated with a team to build an end-to-end functional software that uses lightweight MongoDB as the database to store user information and React.js for the frontend.
 - It analyzed the receipts uploaded by the user using machine learning models (OCR-NLP, CV) to generate a carbon score for the user to help promote eco-friendly behavior.

projects.title: Blood Pressure Calculator
projects.bodyText: - Developed a web application that takes the age and weight of the user as input through a form (frontend), sends it to the flask server, which then makes use of a Machine learning pickled file to predict the Blood Pressure of the user, which is then rendered and displayed on the frontend.

projects.title: Photo Album App
projects.bodyText:
- Created an applicaition for mobile devices using Flutter to serve as a photo album.
 - Its functionalities included importing images from the phone gallery, directly taking pictures with the camera and saving them, displaying the saved images in a grid, allowing to open images in full screen and displaying the details of the photo.
